name: Consult O'clock
tag_list: business-consultants, strategy-consulting, consulting-jobs, social-networking-for-business, business-consultants-uk, become-a-consultant-business-strategy-consulting-consulting-work-from-home-hire-a-consultant-jobs-c, hire-a-consultant, freelance-consulta
overview:
Consult O’clock is a social network that allows clients to easily express complex business problems online and to receive high-quality solutions collaboratively solved by top consultants based throughout the world.

Consult O’clock’s global pool of consultants both compete and collaborate using an innovative set of online work tools to solve problems in virtually any industry or functional area. Our ‘Online Employment’ platform provides an online marketplace for consulting talent - on a project basis.

We are striving to fundamentally change the way startups and small businesses organize themselves and utilize expertise and knowledge, as well as to democratize the access to knowledge so that expertise from anywhere can be applied at any time to solving important problems.

For clients, we provide high-quality, focused solutions through a fast, flexible, and affordable model. For experts, we provide the opportunity to connect and collaborate with peers, solve important problems, earn a living, and grow and develop professionally.
